comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: Could this be a Curtis?

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Hi Howard 33, Without being able to see the plane's wings, tail, and engine, it is difficult to tell. If you have a picture that shows more detail, you could contact the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum - www.nasm.si.edu/research/arch/emailform.cfm. Good luck on your search! Effie
